item.title: Let's Encrypt on OpenShift
item.description: Let’s Encrypt on OpenShift Updated OS on load balancer # wget https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm # yum install epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm Uses python: https://www.redpill-linpro.com/sysadvent/2017/12/15/letsencrypt-on-openshift.html https://certbot.eff.org/about/ Uses bash: - https://blog.openshift.com/lets-encrypt-acme-v2-api/ - https://github.com/Neilpang/acme.sh#currently-acmesh-supports https://community.letsencrypt.org/t/acme-v2-and-wildcard-certificate-support-is-live/55579 https://www.namecheap.com/ Other: https://github.com/certbot/certbot/issues/5074 https://github.com/freeipa/freeipa-letsencrypt https://github.com/antevens/letsencrypt-freeipa https://certbot.eff.org/docs/using.html#dns-plugins
